title: To Patients With Heart Conditions, It's OK For Your Cardiologist To Take Time Off
teaser: A new study says that the mortality risk for patients with certain acute heart conditions was not negatively impacted if they are admitted to the hospital when a cardiologist isn't there. Robert Siegel talks with Dr. Anupam Jena about the study.
